summary: The rebellious daughter of an army general becomes involved with a communist agitator, much to the consternation of her father, who instead attempts to pair her with a handsome yet dim-witted soldier.
cast: Barbara Stanwyck|Robert Young|Hardie Albright|Cliff Edwards|Ruth Donnelly|Gordon Jones|Paul Stanton|Purnell Pratt|Nella Walker|Arthur Vinton|Edward McWade|Henry Kolker|Allan Cavan|Ferdinand Gottschalk|Selmer Jackson|David Newell|Harry Bowen|Eddy Chandler|Jack Cheatham|Joe Dominguez|Lester Dorr|Tom Dugan|Ben Hall|Edward Hearn|Fred Kohler Jr.|Paul Kruger|Tom London|Chris-Pin Martin|Jack Mower|Dave O'Brien|Henry Otho|Garry Owen|Peter Potter|George Reed|Julian Rivero
keywords: screwball comedy|gasoline station|illegal immigrant|texas mexico border|new york city
title: El soldado del amor
